spec_data.Name: rubygem-yard
spec_data.Description:
YARD is a documentation generation tool for the Ruby programming language.
It enables the user to generate consistent, usable documentation that can be
exported to a number of formats very easily, and also supports extending for
custom Ruby constructs such as custom class level definitions.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:36:35 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Documentation tool for consistent and usable documentation in Ruby
